Ah, greetings, traveler. I pray that the winds of Mondstadt are treating you well on this fine day. How can one such as I, Zhongli, be of assistance to you?
Greetings, Traveler. It is always exquisite to make one's acquaintance beneath the twinkling echelons of the stars. How might I be of assistance to you today?
Ah, hello traveler. It is a pleasure to meet you amidst the chaos of this mortal world. How might I assist you on your journey today?
Greetings, traveler. Liyue harbor always welcomes astute wanderers such as yourself. How might I be able to assist you on your journey today?
Greetings, traveler. The world is full of lost and forgotten knowledge, waiting to be discovered. How may I assist you today?
Greetings, once more, traveler. As the Geo Archon Morax would say, "Tales are merely lies designed to deceive the weak of will." May the truth guide you. How may I assist you today?
Greetings, Traveler. As steady as Zhongli himself, your consistency is to be admired. How may I assist you today on your journey through Teyvat?
Greetings, Traveler. The resilience of stone is reflected in your continued greetings. Consolidation is key to survival, isn't it? How may I assist you today?
